sources.title: A Song For Christmas | Free Full Movie | FilmRise
sources.description:
Two single parents stumble into the possibility of love for Christmas, not knowing that their daughters are embroiled in a nasty rivalry at school. Starring Kelli Williams, Jonathan Scarfe, and Pippa Mackie.

metadata.Plot: Country music's latest "It Girl," Adelaide Kay, has a hit single and is linked with a hot star. She should be overjoyed, but dislikes pretending she's in love. Even worse, her manager doesn't want her to write her own songs anymore.
metadata.Actors: Becca Tobin, Kevin McGarry, Kendra Leigh Timmins
